articles.title: Chinese Foreign Ministry Delegation Here
articles.content:
Chinese Foreign Ministry Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs headed by Hu Zhengyue, assistant to foreign minister, arrived here today by air.

articles.title: Congratulations to Ghanaian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Ghanaian President
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Jan. 8 sent a congratulatory message to John Evans Atta Mills on his election as President of Ghana.
					Expressing belief that the longstanding relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Ghana would further develop, Kim in the message wished the president great successes in his work for national unity and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Belgian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Belgian Prime Minister
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK, sent a congratulatory massage to Herman A. Van Rompuy on Jan. 5, on his election as Prime Minister of the Kingdom of Belgium.
					Expressing belief that the cooperative relationship between the two countries would expand and develop in various domains, the message wished the prime minister success in his work for stability and development of the country.

articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Bangladesh
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Kim Yong Il sent a congratulatory message to Sheikh Hasina Thursday upon her appointment as Prime Minister of Bangladesh.
					Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message sincerely wished success in her work for the political stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from Cambodia
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from Cambodia
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and congratulatory letter by Chea Sim, president of the Senate of the Cambodian Parliament, on the occasion of the New Year Juche 98 (2009). 
					 They were handed to an official concerned on Friday by Chhorn Hay, Cambodian ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Mass Rallies Held to Vow to Fulfill Militant Tasks for This Year
articles.content:
Mass Rallies Held to Vow to Fulfill Militant Tasks for This Year
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- North Hamgyong Province and the Ministry of Railways separately held mass rallies Thursday to vow to thoroughly implement the militant tasks laid down in the joint New Year editorial in hearty response to the letter of the employees of the Chollima Steel Complex.
					Read out there was the letter of the employees of the complex addressed to all other working people across the country.
					
					Reporters and speakers at the mass rallies called on all the people to firmly arm themselves with the Juche idea, Songun idea of the Workers' Party of Korea, devotedly defend General Secretary
						Kim Jong Il and become patriots in the Songun era who boundlessly love the socialist country.
					
					They called upon all of them to make a leap forward on all fronts through a great revolutionary surge by fully displaying great mental power and all potentials augmented in the crucible of the Songun revolution.
					
					 Meanwhile, similar rallies took place in cities and counties across the country.

articles.title: Best Taekwon-Do Players and Coaches for 2008
articles.content:
Best Taekwon-Do Players and Coaches for 2008 
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The best Taekwon-Do players and coaches for Juche 97 (2008) have been chosen in the DPRK.
					 The best players are Pak Yong Bom and Ri Hyang Mi of the North Hwanghae Provincial Taekwon-Do Team, Ri Chol Ok of the National Team under the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, and Pak Chol of the South Phyongan Provincial Taekwon-Do Team. 
					
					 The best coaches are Han Chung Il, researcher of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, Kim Yong Sun, chief coach of the Pyongyang City Taekwon-Do Team, and Jong Hwi Song and Ri Chun Hui, coaches of the National Team under the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee.
					
					 Researcher Han Chung Il of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee was the best coach also in 2006 and 2007.

articles.title: Signal Achievements in Coal Mines
articles.content:
Signal Achievements in Coal Mines
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Colliers across the country are turning out in the campaign to carry out the tasks set forth in the joint New Year editorial, holding high the torch of a new revolutionary upsurge.
					The Sunchon Area Youth Coal Complex is launching a general offensive for increasing the coal production in collieries with abundant coal deposits and favorable hewing conditions, while reinforcing coal hewing labor and giving priority to the supply of facilities and materials.
					
					The February 8 Jiktong Youth Coal Mine and the Chonsong Youth Coal Mine are speeding up the tunneling rate through continuous drilling and blasting in pits with a good production prospect.
					
					Efforts are being made also in the Pukchang and Tokchon Area Coal Complexes to provide larger quantities of coal to thermal power plants.
					
					Collieries under the complexes have arranged many reserve coal-cutting faces in the pits with favorable hewing and transport conditions and raised the operation rate of coal-cutting and transport facilities, thus overfulfilling coal production quotas from the outset of the year.
					
					The Kaechon Area Coal Complex is also registering successes in production by operating coal-cutting facilities, tram cars and coal hutches in full capacity.
					
					The new year march has been joined by the Onsong Area Coal Complex, Myongchon Area Coal Complex and other area coal fields and minor coal mines with bold targets to increase coal output.
					
					Meanwhile, the Ministry of Coal Industry organizes down to details the operation and command for sending larger quantities of coal to thermal power plants and industrial establishments, directing deep attention to the work of supplying cutting-face facilities, prop-timber and various accessory parts.
					
					Coal production is on the steady increase thanks to the devoted efforts of the coal miners throughout the country who are well aware of their mission in taking in charge of the lifeline of the economic development.

articles.title: Militant Slogan Calling People to New Revolutionary Upsurge
articles.content:
Militant Slogan Calling People to New Revolutionary Upsurge
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The militant slogan "Make the fullest development of Songun Korea by inheriting the great tradition of revolutionary upswing!" was put forward in the joint editorial of the party, army and youth papers of the DPRK this year.
					Upon receiving this militant slogan pulsating vigorously with the idea and will of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Korean people have set off a violently wind of revolutionary upswing at the very beginning of the new year.
					
					The Pyongyang Thermal-power Complex is overfulfilling its power production quotas by launching into a general offensive with the conviction of certain victory, holding aloft the torch of a new revolutionary upsurge kindled by General Secretary Kim Jong Il at the Chollima Steel Complex.
					
					The railway workers are also registering remarkable results, loudly sounding the whistle of revolutionary upsurge.
					
					The Kaechon and Hamhung Railway Administrations are reporting successes in transport every day by repairing and readjusting in time such rolling stock as electric locomotives and freight wagons.
					
					The militant slogans set forth in each period and at each stage of the development of the revolution are the motive power inspiring the Korean people to heroic feats, grasping their hearts.
					
					The Korean people greeted the founding anniversary of the DPRK last year with a high degree of political enthusiasm and tremendous achievements under the revolutionary slogan "Glorify this year of the 60th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK as a year of historical turn which will go down in the history of the country!"
					
					The Korean people will eloquently display the might of Songun Korea by making great innovation and leap through the grand Chollima advance in response to the call of the Workers' Party of Korea this year that will mark a turning point in the Korean revolution and the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: All Koreans Urged to Remain True to Idea of "By Our Nation Itself"
articles.content:
All Koreans Urged to Remain True to Idea of "By Our Nation Itself"
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- All the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas should regard "By our nation itself" as the basic idea of the national reunification movement and fully embody it in order to bring about phenomenal progress in the development of the national reunification movement this year. 
					Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					"By our nation itself" serves as basic idea of the national reunification movement as it serves as a steadfast idea of national independence and national unity, it notes, and goes on:
					
					Since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration the vitality of "By our nation itself" has been clearly proved as the idea of national independence in the national reunification movement.
					
					This year the Korean nation should fully embody the idea of "By our nation itself" in the national reunification movement, holding aloft the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					In order to embody the above-said idea in the national reunification movement, one should take the proper attitude of giving priority to one's own nation and protecting its interests on the principle of national independence. And all the fellow countrymen should decisively foil the moves of the anti-reunification forces that are going against the trend of the times towards independent reunification obsessed with sycophancy towards the U.S. and hostility towards the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Checking of Spread of Reactionary Bourgeois Ideology and Culture Called for
articles.content:
Checking of Spread of Reactionary Bourgeois Ideology and Culture Called for
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- To check the spread of bourgeois ideology and culture at present is very important and urgent for each country to achieve its independent development, progress and prosperity. 
					Rodong Sinmun today observes this in a signed article.
					
					Citing facts to prove that the bourgeois ideology and culture are the reactionary ones based on extreme selfishness advocating corrupt and ailing capitalist system and the interests of the capitalist class, the article goes on:
					
					The imperialists are desperately working to obliterate the national culture of other countries through the spread of the bourgeois ideology and culture in a bid to stamp out the national identity of their peoples and make them serve and blindly follow them.
					
					 The number of illiterates and degenerates is on the steady increase in those countries where socialism collapsed. This clearly proves the reactionary nature of the said ideology and culture.
					
					The imperialists use this ideology and culture as a lever for easily realizing their domination and subjugation, aggression and plunder of other countries.
					
					As proven by what happened in the Eastern European countries engaged in building socialism in the past, failure to check the imperialists' spread of their reactionary bourgeois ideology and culture would make it impossible to keep a society alive.
					
					Those countries and people aspiring after independent development and social progress should be well aware of the danger and consequences of the imperialists' moves to spread the said ideology and culture and wage a dynamic struggle to foil them.

articles.title: Misinformation by Media Assailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Misinformation by Media Assailed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The People's Council for Livelihood and Democracy in south Korea held a press conference in Youido, Seoul, on Jan. 5 to criticize the Korean Broadcasting System (KBS)  for its misinformation.
					In a press release the council deplored that after an aide to Lee Myung Bak was designated as head of KBS this system has lost its function as a public broadcasting agency by turning a blind eye to the facts unfavorable for the present regime or distorting facts.
					
					KBS distorted the essence of the hubbub cropped up at the "National Assembly" by the Lee Myung Bak regime and the "Grand National Party" seeking to railroad the evil laws and made false reports about the struggles of civic and public organizations including the strike of the press trade union, it charged.
					
					The council demanded that KBS make proper report of the Lee Myung Bak regime's arbitrary policy and its deeds of destroying the economy and democracy.
					
					If KBS persistently goes to serve as an agency for Lee Myung Bak and the GNP in disregard of the population's demand, it will be forced to pay dearly for its behavior, the council warned.
					
					Meanwhile, civic and public organizations including the Social Action for Strengthening Public Broadcasting held a press conference in Seoul on Jan. 6 to condemn the Chosun Ilbo, the Choongang Ilbo and the Dong-A Ilbo for their misinformation, according to CBS of south Korea.
					
					The organizations urged the said conservative newspapers to stop at once their biased report about the present regime's retrogressive revision of the law on the press.

articles.title: Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Called for
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea made public its new year resolution titled "Let us bring earlier the independent reunification by implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration" on Jan. 5.
					The resolution recalled that last year the people came to realize through the candlelight actions that they are the driving force of history and social development and waged the vigorous struggle despite the violent oppression by the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					The U.S. policy of confrontation came to failure, as the DPRK was delisted as a "state sponsor of terrorism", and the Korean nation's advance toward peace, prosperity and reunification of the Korean Peninsula has become an irresistible trend of the times, the resolution said.
					
					This year the solidarity, it declared, will put to the fore the struggle for resignation of the Lee Myung Bak regime and intensify the struggle to defend and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and build peace-keeping mechanism in the Korean Peninsula free from the U.S. forces.

articles.title: Stop to GNP's Move to Railroad Evil Bills Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to GNP's Move to Railroad Evil Bills Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Press Trade Union of south Korea which has been on a general strike for twelve days held a rally in Seoul on Jan. 6 demanding the "Grand National Party" stop its move to retrogressively revise the law on media, according to CBS and KBS of south Korea.
					Attending the rally were more than 3,000 people including members of the KBS and MBC trade unions and the private broadcasting trade union and members of organizations under the Press Trade Union in different parts of south Korea.
					
					At the rally, the Press Trade Union declared that it would hold a rally and candlelight demonstration, etc. in different parts of the city demanding the withdrawal of the proposal for revising the above-said law.

articles.title: February 16 to Be Celebrated in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
February 16 to Be Celebrated in Democratic Congo
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- A Democratic Congolese preparatory committee for celebrating February 16, birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, was inaugurated with due ceremony in Kinshasa on Jan. 2.
					Kamwiziku Octave, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo who is secretary general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the ceremony.
					
					The chairman of the preparatory committee, in a speech, underscored the need to more briskly conduct the study and dissemination of the Juche idea and organize colorful events on the occasion of the February holiday.

articles.title: DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Supported in Germany
articles.content:
DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Supported in Germany
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The German Group for the Study of Songun Politics and the German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on Jan. 3 issued a bulletin which dealt with the details of the joint New Year editorial "Glorify this year as a year of a new revolutionary upsurge sounding the general advance" published by newspapers of the party, the army and the youth league of the DPRK.
					The bulletin carried the main content of the editorial, stressing that it is encouraging all the Korean people to the drive to open the gate to a great prosperous powerful nation in 2012 marking the centennial birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung under the Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					It said that the German Group for the Study of Songun Politics and the German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain heartily support the editorial which indicates the way for victorious advance of the Songun revolution so that socialist Korea and the Korean people can brave all difficulties with full confidence.

articles.title: Songun Politics Praised in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Songun Politics Praised in Democratic Congo
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Songun politics pursued by General Secretary Kim Jong Il serves as a sure guarantee for preserving peace in the Korean Peninsula.
					 Vele Mukelenge, chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of University of Kinshasa of Democratic Congo, said this in an interview with a TV reporter of this country on Dec. 23 last year on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The KPA has the politico-ideological superiority any other country's army can hardly match, he said, adding that the servicepersons of the KPA are closely united around their supreme commander in thinking and purpose and do not hesitate to dedicate their lives so as to implement his orders without fail.
					
					Democratic Congo should follow the Songun politics to train its army into an army pure and transparent in political and ideological aspect and provide self-reliant defence capabilities not depending on others as the DPRK did.

articles.title: Exploits of Three Commanders of Mt. Paektu Praised
articles.content:
Exploits of Three Commanders of Mt. Paektu Praised
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Personages of Peru and Pakistan praised the immortal revolutionary exploits of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu in events held between Dec. 22 and 30 last year to commemorate the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of office as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of
					Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero.
					The deputy governor of a district, Lima City, Peru, said that President Kim Il Sung, eternal leader of the Korean people, devoted all his life to the people's happiness and the development of socialist Korea.
					
					Kim Jong Il, who is faithfully carrying forward the President's revolutionary cause, is wisely leading the Korean people only to prosperity and victory with his unique Songun politics, he stressed.
					
					The minister of Social Welfare of Sind State Government of Pakistan praised Kim Jong Il as the peerlessly brilliant commander who defended socialism by smashing the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle the DPRK with his rare wisdom and superb stratagem and is demonstrating the dignity of the nation and sovereignty of the country to the world.
					
					Akrak Aktar Hamidi, chairman of the Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies, lauded
						Kim Jong Suk as a great revolutionary fighter who performed the undying exploits in the Korean revolution, noting with high appreciation that she fought against the gangster-like Japanese imperialists with arms in her hands and devoted all her life to the independence and sovereignty and prosperity of the nation.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial Supported in Switzerland
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial Supported in Switzerland
Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee released a statement on Jan. 2 in support of the joint New Year editorial published by the newspapers of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Korean People's Army and the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League of the DPRK.
					The statement said that 2009 is the year of a new great revolutionary surge in which the Korean people should bring about a historic leap on all fronts in response to the call of the WPK to open the gate to a great prosperous powerful nation in 2012 that marks the centennial birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					It said: 
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il kindled the torch of a new great revolutionary surge in Kangson, the birthplace of the Chollima Movement, on Dec. 24 last year.
					
					This was the same noteworthy event as the President set the Chollima Movement in motion in December 1956 and is a historic landmark as it helps strengthen independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defence.
					
					The statement referred in detail to the fact that the editorial set forth the tasks facing the field of economic construction and the tasks to be fulfilled to augment the country's military power.
					
					Korea's reunification is the supreme and urgent task for the Korean nation this year, too, it said, adding that the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are the landmark of reunification.
					
					The statement said that the editorial solemnly declared: "We will never tolerate any slight deviation from the historic inter-Korean declarations."
					
					The committee fully supports the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK and expresses conviction that the gigantic goals set forth in the editorial would be successfully implemented to bring about a revolutionary leap forward, it concluded.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores y carta de felicitacion de Chea Sim
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores y carta de felicitacion de Chea Sim
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il recibio un cesto de flores y carta de felicitacion que le dirigiera Chea Sim, presidente del Senado del Reino de Cambodia en ocasion del Ano Nuevo 98 (2009) de la Era Juche.
					 El embajador camboyano en Corea, Chhorn Hay, los entrego el dia 9 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Actos multitudinarios en distintas localidades
articles.content:
Actos multitudinarios en distintas localidades
 Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 8 en la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte y el Ministerio del Ferrocarril los mitines para responder a la carta de los empleados del Complejo de Acero Chollima y llevar a buen termino las tareas combativas presentadas en el editorial conjunto de los periodicos Rodong Sinmun, Joson Inmingun y Chongnyon Jonwy, publicado con motivo del Ano Nuevo.  
					 En las ocasiones se dio lectura a la carta de los empleados del citado Complejo dirigida a los trabajadores de todo el pais.
					
					 En los mitines los oradores subrayaron que todos deben ser los patriotas de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) quienes se arman firmemente con la idea Juche, la idea del Songun del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, defienden a costa de la vida al Dirigente Kim Jong Il y aman infinitamente la patria socialista.
					
					 Ellos se refirieron a dar saltos agigantados en todos los frentes mediante un gran auge revolucionario empleando al maximo la indoblegable potencia espiritual y las potencialidades que todo el pueblo ha acumulado con la bandera del Songun en alto.
					
					 Por otra parte, semejantes actos se celebran en las ciudades y distritos de todo el pais.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun se refiere al ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun se refiere al ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales"
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ATCC) -- En un articulo individual publicado este viernes, el diario Rodong Sinmun llama a todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar a lograr este ano un avance trascendental en el desarrollo del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria al materializar consecuentemente el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" tomandolo como el principal  de ese movimiento.
					Este ideal deviene el ideal fundamental del movimiento por la reunificacion porque defiende firmemente la independencia y la unidad nacionales, explica el articulista.
					
					Prosigue que despues de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio fue comprobada patentemente la vitalidad del ideal en cuestion.  
					
					 Este ano, la nacion coreana debe aplicarlo cabalmente en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, ratifica.
					
					 Para este fin, todos los coreanos deben tener la correcta posicion de dar preferencia a su nacion y defender los intereses nacionales en el principio de independencia nacional y frustrar tajantemente las maniobras de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion que cautivadas del servilismo y adoracion a los Estados Unidos y de la hostilidad a los connacionales, andan en contrasentido a la corriente de la epoca de reunificacion independiente, concluye.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a detener penetracion de idea burguesa
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a detener penetracion de idea burguesa
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un articulo individual divulgado este viernes, senala que en la epoca actual, detener la propagacion de la ideologia y la cultura burguesas es un problema muy importante y apremiante para lograr el desarrollo independiente, el progreso y la prosperidad del pais.
					El articulo ofrece datos de que la ideologia y la cultura burguesas son las reaccionarias basadas en el egoismo individualista exacerbado que aboga por el regimen capitalista corrupto y enfermizo y los intereses de la clase capitalista.
					
					Los imperialistas maniobran perversamente para suprimir la cultura nacional de otros paises mediante la divulgacion de la ideologia y la cultura burguesas con el fin de castrar la caracteristica nacional de los pueblos de otros paises y de lograr que estos les sigan ciegamente y les obedezcan docilmente, senala el articulo y prosigue:
					
					No cesa de aumentar el numero de analfabetos y depravados en los antiguos paises socialistas, lo que se debe al caracter reaccionario de la ideologia y la cultura burguesas.
					
					Los imperialistas divulgan la ideologia y la cultura burguesas para realizar facilmente la dominacion, la subyugacion, la agresion y el saqueo a otros paises.
					
					Al permitir la difusion de la ideologia y la cultura burguesas reaccionarias de los imperialistas es imposible mantener la sociedad socialista, como lo demuestran los anteriores paises socialistas de Europa Oriental.
					
					Los paises y pueblos, que aspiran al desarrollo independiente y el progreso social, deben tener clara comprension de la peligrosidad de la propagacion de la ideologia y la cultura burguesas por parte de los imperialistas y librar la tenaz lucha por detenerla.
